divs: Sighting DetailsOn W.Broad Street, I parked at a shopping center with the car pointed roughlyEast and while talking on a cell phone, noticed an object at least 30,000 insky. Having a private pilots license, and noticing the fairly heavy sprayingthat afternoon, I watched to see what kind of plane it was.Between 1755 and 1810 Eastern, the roughly square-shaped object remained nearlystationary.For the first few minutes I thought it could have been traveling NW, but itremained in the same relative location.At about 1810 when I last looked toward the object, it was gone.
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Richmond
There were no other sightings in Richmond on or around October 12th 2002
